text: The Towering Inferno is a 1974 American action drama thriller movie directed by John Guillermin and starring Paul Newman, Steve McQueen, William Holden, Fred Astaire, Susan Blakely, Richard Chamberlain, Jennifer Jones, Robert Vaughn, Robert Wagner, Dabney Coleman, O.J. Simpson, Susan Flannery. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and Warner Bros. and was nominated for 8 Oscars and won 3 Oscars at the Academy Awards in 1975. ==Other websites== * * Category:1974 action movies Category:1974 drama movies Category:1974 thriller movies Category:American action movies Category:American drama movies Category:American thriller movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by John Guillermin
title: The Towering Inferno
